name: Colors Matter
description:
A game where colors matter.

A game where you need to land on your enemies as you turn into the same color as they are. Land on an enemy of a different color and you lose 1 live. Lose all lives and it's game over.

Note for MAC users: The mac port currently has no sounds and the porting of the font got messed up, which is why the font for points and colorblind mode are different from the rest
